ValidationRule.description: This is used to request for corporate card, to show error message when Section 6 fields are filled without selecting corresponding values in Workflow Type
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: and ( (ispickval (Status__c , 'Draft')), Workflow__c = $CustomMetadata.IFv2_Workflows__mdt.Requestsforcorporatecard.Name__c , (NOT(INCLUDES(WorkflowType__c , 'Data modification'))), OR( NOT(ISBLANK(TEXT( RequestExtension3__r.Bank__c ))), NOT(ISBLANK( RequestExtension3__r.Digit__c )), NOT(ISBLANK( RequestExtension3__r.Agency__c )), NOT(ISBLANK( RequestExtension3__r.CurrentAccount__c )), NOT(ISBLANK( RequestExtension3__r.SpecifyOther__c )) ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Not allowed to enter data in section 6-3 without selecting corresponding value in Workflow Type.
